question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. Benz sign
B. woman in purple dress
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The woman in the purple dress is clearly in the background behind the tennis player, while the Benz sign is on the wall behind the player but still farther back than the player himself, making the player the closest object to the camera.
